TopicTitle: Attaching two vertical elements with a horizontal, radially attached fuselage?

Articles.Content:
This is what I want to do. I have tried every combination of struts, rad attachment points, docking ports, etc that I can think of, but still no luck.

Is there some trick to this?

I am trying to build a small surface station with a central vertical tower, and horizontal fuselage "walkways" out to smaller vertical towers.

I have done this using separate launches and a rover to position the parts as seen on the "Modular Base Design" thread, but there must be some way to get this done in the VAB, right? I don't care if it doesn't come apart, it will never be disassembled once launched.
Looks like this is a duplicate thread. Closed.
